local_intent: Approach and precisely align to the lid handle, then verify alignment.
assumptions: End-effector is already near the lid area from a prior MoveAbove step.
Lid is visible enough to localize and align to its handle.
coherence_with_global: Implements the GLOBAL_BT micro-step around ApproachAndAlign(target=lid_handle) with perception first and IsAt verification after; values use binned ports (tolerance=0.01, timeout_ms=1500, num_attempts=2).
